explanation: [0-0] The video starts in a melon field, with two Hami melons beside green leaves on black soil, one with black eyebrows and pink lips, smiling. The other has no eyebrows but has two hands, with a surprised expression. There are white subtitles in the lower left corner of the screen: "GOODLAND".

[0-9] A hand enters the screen from the right side of the camera and takes away the Hami melon with pink lips. It puts it on a white platform, on which are placed medical instruments, including needles, cotton swabs, scalpels, and various medicines. A hand wearing a blue glove poked the Hami melon and checked the Hami melon with a stethoscope. The Hami melon's eyes widened, its mouth opened slightly, and its expression turned sad.
